eyata hethuwa nam 1940 - 1950 baw kolambaata thadasanna pradeshayanhi elle kridawan karanu labu nagarika janathawa wisin nagarikawa pawathi wideshikayan wisin krida kirimen pasuwa iwathalana tenis panduda upayogi karaminda, rabar saha binko bola washayen hadunwana lada wishesha panduda upayogi kara ganimin thibu kalasimawak wana athara in tharagayaka jayagrahanaya laba gaththada eya dakshathawala jayak nowana athara panduwe wisheshathwaya matha labaganna jayak washayen sama elle kridakayekuta menma nawathamayen godanagana lada elle sammelanatayada watahi atha.[uputadakwima awashyayi] ee anuwa elle sammelanaya wisin pradhana tharagayan sadaha tenis panduwe mathupita athi bul kotasa iwath karamin pasu elle kridawata uchitha wana ayurin sakas kota elle kridawe yoda wimata katayuthu salaswana ladi.

(21/13, 21/9) chiyang chiyen weyi saha hung en tsu (china thayipe) wisin wata 2-0 k lesa lochana da silwa saha dilmi dayas (shri lankawa) parajaya karana ladaha. (21/6, 21/9) hon kon hamuwe tharaga 5-0 ka parajayak ko shing heyi (hon kon) wisin wata 2-0 k lesa lochana da silwa (shri lankawa) parajaya karana ladi.
